problem.markdown:
You are importing data from a SQL database to Excel 2016 by using queries. There are four tables in the SQL database. Three of the tables have relationships defined between them. You select two tables to be imported, including the one without table relationships. You load the data into Excel data model and define a table relationship between the two tables.
>>Where is this new table relationship kept?<<
(x) Only in the Excel data model ( ) In both the Excel data model and SQL database ( ) Only in the SQL database ( ) Only in the Query Editor
[explanation] The new table relationship is kept only in the Excel data model. [explanation]
problem.p: You are importing data from a SQL database to Excel 2016 by using queries. There are four tables in the SQL database. Three of the tables have relationships defined between them. You select two tables to be imported, including the one without table relationships. You load the data into Excel data model and define a table relationship between the two tables.
Where is this new table relationship kept?

choicegroup.label: Where is this new table relationship kept?
choicegroup.choice: Only in the Excel data model
In both the Excel data model and SQL database

div.p: The new table relationship is kept only in the Excel data model.
